text: Welcome to this video from Learned Electrics. Today we will look at the power triangle and ask ourselves what is it and how do we use it? And what we want to know as electricians is how many amps does a piece of equipment use.

The power triangle is shown here, and we always draw it in this style. It makes it easy to remember and easy to use. Here at Learned Electrics, we all agree that this is the most useful formula for electricians, and here is why. If we know the current that will flow through a circuit when the equipment is turned on, we can choose the correct size fuse or breaker for proper functioning and for safety.
